fields.name: IsAggregated
fields.description: Whether the values are aggregates across all workers or not

fields.name: Maximum
fields.description: Maximum of the metric sampled during the time period

fields.name: Minimum
fields.description: Minimum of the metric sampled during the time period

fields.name: RoleInstance
fields.description:
Role Instance. Null if this counter is not per instance 
This is returned and should be whichever instance name we desire to be returned
i.e. CPU and Memory return RDWORKERNAME (LargeDed..._IN_0) 
where RDWORKERNAME is Machine name below and RoleInstance name in parenthesis

fields.name: Timestamp
fields.description: Time at which metric is measured

fields.name: Total
fields.description: Total value of the metric. If multiple measurements are made this will have sum of all.
